level1.label: Balanced
level1.summary: Your gut health shows a balanced pattern. You experience minimal digestive discomfort and maintain steady energy levels throughout the day.
level1.methodPositioning: Discover how The Fine Diet Method can help you maintain optimal gut health and continue building on your strong foundation.

level2.label: Sensitive
level2.summary: Your gut health shows sensitivity patterns. You experience occasional digestive discomfort that responds to dietary and lifestyle adjustments.
level2.methodPositioning: Learn how The Fine Diet Method can help you identify patterns and create a personalized approach to support your sensitive gut.

level3.label: Reactive
level3.summary: Your gut health shows reactive patterns. You experience frequent digestive discomfort that significantly impacts your daily life and energy levels.
level3.methodPositioning: The Fine Diet Method provides a structured approach to help you rebuild gut health and create sustainable changes for long-term wellness.

level4.label: Highly Reactive
level4.summary: Your gut health shows highly reactive patterns. You experience frequent and significant digestive symptoms that require focused attention and support.
level4.methodPositioning: The Fine Diet Method offers a comprehensive system to help you restore gut function and build a foundation for improved health and vitality.
